T02D2722:89b-1: p'a pa bi d'a ra na man ha ra n'a ma lo ka n'a tha sto tra /
T02D2722:89b-3: 'jig rten mgon po'i bstod pa yid 'phrog sdig 'joms zhes bya ba /
T02D2722:89b-4: thugs rje chen po la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2722:89b-5: lha dang lha min mi yis zhabs la phyag byas shing //
T02D2722:89b-6: skye rga na 'chi ma lus rab tu 'joms pa'i sku //
T02D2722:89b-7: 'jig rten dbang phyug thugs rje ldan pa khyod kyis ni //
T02D2722:89b-8: mgon med bdag la bsrung mdzad thugs rje mdzad du gsol //
T02D2722:89b-9: 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho'i klong dkyil du ni nub gyir te //
T02D2722:89b-10: nyon mongs dba' rlabs kyis ni yang dag nyams nyes shing //
T02D2722:89b-11: tsho nges 'debs pa bdag la btang snyoms ma mdzad par //
T02D2722:89b-12: khyod la bstod bgyid thugs rje chen pos bsrung du gsol //
T02D2722:89b-13: srid pa'i rab rib kyis ni blo mig nyer gtses shing //
T02D2722:89b-14: 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa yis ni lus sems g-yengs gyur pa //
T02D2722:89b-15: ji srid mi bzad mnar med gnas sum lhung ba //
T02D2722:89b-16: bcom ldan spyan ras gzigs kyis bdag la bskyab tu gsol //
T02D2722:89b-17: rmongs pas rgyun du gzhan gyi bud med bsten bgyis dang //
T02D2722:89b-18: srog chags stong phrag srog dang bral ba la sogs pa //
T02D2722:89b-19: mgon po bdag gis sdug bsngal rgyu ni tshang bar bgyis //
T02D2722:89b-20: lus kyi nyes pa de dag yang dag sbyang du gsol //
T02D2722:89b-21: gang zhig bkur sti'i ched dang 'tsho ba'i ched du ni //
T02D2722:89b-22: 'jig rten mi bden brdzun tshig brlang po la sogs pa //
T02D2722:89b-23: 'jig rten dbang phyug ngag gi nyes pa'i kun sbyor yang //
T02D2722:89b-24: dmyal ba'i rgyu de yun rings ma lus goms par bgyis //
T02D2722:89b-25: sems can rnams la rang gis gnod pa gang bgyis dang //
T02D2722:89b-26: gzhan gyis bgyis pa la ni rjes su yi rang ba'i //
T02D2722:89b-27: bdag gis yid kyi sdig de dag ni smre sngags su //
T02D2722:89b-28: 'don zhing mchis pas bsal du gsol dang mgon po kye //
T02D2722:89b-29: lha dang mi dang lha min skye ba rnams dang ni //
T02D2722:89b-30: dud 'gro dang ni dmyal ba yi dgas rnams su yang //
T02D2722:89b-31: sdug bsngal dang bcas 'gro ba gang gnas de dag la//
T02D2722:89b-32: bsrung ba mdzad ces khyod kyi lo rgyus bdag la khums //
T02D2722:90a-1: thugs rje yang dag mdzad du gsol //
T02D2722:90a-2: g-yar lus dar la bab pa yal bar nyams la khad //
T02D2722:90a-3: de phyir ji srid dmyal ba'i gnas su ma zhugs par //
T02D2722:90a-4: bcom ldan khyod ni bdag gis zhu ba gsan par mdzod //
T02D2722:90a-5: gzhan yang gzhan don la ni rang nyid gshegs mdzad na //
T02D2722:90a-6: bsod nams ma bsags bdag ni spyan sdar mchis kyang spong //
T02D2722:90a-7: khyod kyi thugs rje bsod nams dag la ltos sam ci //
T02D2722:90a-8: sdug bsngal med la snying rje bya bar su lags na //
T02D2722:90a-9: dran pa tsam gyis khyod ni yongs su mnyes nas su //
T02D2722:90a-10: sdig zad mdzad ces bdag gis ma khums lags sam ci//
T02D2722:90a-11: de phyir bcom ldan gzhan phan mdzad la phul du byung //
T02D2722:90a-12: bdag 'dir ma dor bsrung dang bskyab pa mdzad du gsol //
T02D2722:90a-13: glang chen dag dang nor bu sras bcas btsun mo dang //
T02D2722:90a-14: gnod med rgyal srid khang bzangs rnam par bkra ba dang //
T02D2722:90a-15: sha dang rus pa dbu ni sku mtshal mthar thug btang //
T02D2722:90a-16: grub pa'i mig sman rkang pa byug pa dag dang ni //
T02D2722:90a-17: grub pa'i gnod sbyin dang ni gnod sbyin mo dag kyang //
T02D2722:90a-18: 'jig rten mnga'a bdag khyod ni mnyes par gang su
T02D2722:90a-19: dag / don gnyer rnams la mthar thug ma mchis
T02D2722:90a-20: sbyin par mdzad // gang dag rkang pa lag pa mig dang bral rnams dang //
T02D2722:90a-21: sna tshogs bro 'tshal gyis ni 'jigs pa dang bcas rnams //
T02D2722:90a-22: yon tan zab mo khyod mnyes pa yis de dag gi //
T02D2722:90a-23: yan lag sobs 'gyur bro 'tshal dag kyang zhi bar 'gyur //
T02D2722:90a-24: mkha' lding sprul gdug gnod dang mkha' 'gro ma dang ni //
T02D2722:90a-25: rnal 'byor ma yi gnod kun rtag tu zhi mdzad cing //
T02D2722:90a-26: rgyal ba khyod kyis gang la dgongs pa de la ni//
T02D2722:90a-27: gshin rje'i pho nya rmi lam du yang mthong mi 'gyur //
T02D2722:90a-28: mgon po bdag ni 'jigs pas rnam par g-yengs pa yis //
T02D2722:90a-29: nyin dang mtshan du lag pa gyen du brkyang ste du //
T02D2722:90a-30: 'jig rten dbang phyug des na bdag ni 'gums pa dang //
T02D2722:90a-31: nye ba lags na bcom ldan skyabs med 'bor ram ci //
T02D2722:90a-32: yul dang dbang po gdul dka' sems kyang g-yo ba dang //
T02D2722:90a-33: mnyam par ma bzhag lus kyis sdig pa mang po bgyis //
T02D2722:90a-34: nyams pa bdag gi 'khor bzhin du ni skye ba 'dir //
T02D2722:90a-35: thams cad kyis ni sdig pa 'ba' zhig bsgrubs par zad //
T02D2722:90a-36: de phyir da ltar khyod la thal mo sbyar nas ni //
T02D2722:90b-0: 'jig rten dbang phyug gang gis @90b ngan song sdug bsngal dag //
T02D2722:90b-1: myong mi 'gyur bar khyod kyi spyan sngar bde 'gror ni //
T02D2722:90b-2: mchi bar bdag zhu 'di ni gnang bar mdzad du gsol //
T02D2722:90b-3: khyod ni 'dod chags zhe sdang rnam par 'joms pa'i sku //
T02D2722:90b-4: khyod ni 'khor ba'i mtsho chen gyi ni chu lon lags //
T02D2722:90b-5: khyod ni ltung bas skrag pa 'dren pa'i lag pa ste//
T02D2722:90b-6: khyod ni brjed bcas mi dge 'dzin pa'i sgra gcan lags //
T02D2722:90b-7: khyod ni bde gshegs bla med de nyid ston pa po //
T02D2722:90b-8: khyod ni sdug bsngal mang ldan 'gro ba'i skyob byed yin //
T02D2722:90b-9: khyod ni yid 'joms gdul dka'i bdud las nges brgal ba //
T02D2722:90b-10: khyod ni srid pa'i rgya mtsho'i pha rol brgal ba lags //
T02D2722:90b-11: khyod ni nad pa ma lus nad ni rgyun gcod sku //
T02D2722:90b-12: khyod kyi sku ni 'gro ba'i nang na mchog tu mdzes //
T02D2722:90b-13: khyod ni dpe med thugs rje'i rgya mtsho chen po ste //
T02D2722:90b-14: khyod ni rgyu med gnyen du 'gro ba rnams kyis rtogs //
T02D2722:90b-15: khyod kyis g-yo ba'i dbang po 'bad pha med par btul //
T02D2722:90b-16: khyod ni yul la chags pa yongs su bcom pa lags //
T02D2722:90b-17: khyod kyi thugs ni bsam gtan mchog la mnyam par
T02D2722:90b-18: bzhag / khyod kyi thugs ni song ba kun la
T02D2722:90b-19: snyoms par mdzad // thugs rje ldan pa gzhan la phan par mdzad kyang ni //
T02D2722:90b-20: mi rig sbrul chen rgyab tu zhon nas yul rnams kyi //
T02D2722:90b-21: 'dod pas dge ba nyams par gyur pa bdag la 'dir //
T02D2722:90b-22: khyod ni gang gis yongs su dgyes par mi mdzad lags //
T02D2722:90b-23: khyod kyi spyan sngar g-yar chab 'byin cing smre ba yi //
T02D2722:90b-24: sdig ldan bdag la gang gis bsrung ba mi mdzad na //
T02D2722:90b-25: mgon po 'gro ba kun rten thugs rje gang lags pa /
T02D2722:90b-26: de ci khyod kyis nyi tshe ba ru bskyed lags sam //
T02D2722:90b-27: mgon po khyod kyi thugs rjes nam mkha' khyab pa yi //
T02D2722:90b-28: sprin byung char pa'i rgyun ni chu dang skam dag dang //
T02D2722:90b-29: mtho na dman yul ni kun 'bab cing sems can gyi //
T02D2722:90b-30: don du kun la nyin mtshan rgyun mi 'chad du
T02D2722:90b-31: 'jug / de ltar bcom ldan dran pa'i bdag gi
T02D2722:90b-32: bsod nams gang // des ni 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal mang ldan de dag gis //
T02D2722:90b-33: 'gro nang mdzes pa rnam mang rnam par rol pa yi //
T02D2722:90b-34: po ta la yi ri rtser gnas pa thob par
T02D2722:90b-35: shog /'jig rten dbang phyug gi bstod pa yid 'phrog
T02D2722:90b-37: shar phyogs ba ren da'i slob dpon mkhas pa chen po tsandra go mis mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02D2722:91a-0: // / rgya gar shar phyogs ba ren da'i @91a * //
